column4: i having issues booting into ubuntu after installing 11.10 in Lenovo x120e, I installed it using alternate-amd64 the iso

- as per the community page - there were issues with EFI boot and they have given instructions to purge grub-efi and instead install grub-pc. I had did the workaround and installed grub-pc and still it doesn't boot into ubuntu, It saya 'No Operating System Found'
- this is the community page I was referring to - https://help.ubuntu.com/community/X120e#Installation
